com.software.reuze

Class pma_ParticleVerlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ga_Vector2
      • com.software.reuze.pma_ParticleVerlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class pma_ParticleVerlet
extends ga_Vector2
    An individual 2D particle for use by the VerletPhysics and VerletSpring classes. A particle has weight, can be locked in space and its position constrained inside an (optional) axis-aligned bounding box.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      List<pma_i_ConstraintParticle> constraints
      An optional particle constraints, called immediately after a particle is updated (and only used if particle is unlocked (default)
